ComicInfo.Summary:
The Human Tidal Wave! [Part 1]: A rocket that was destined for Venus goes off course and crashes near where the Sea Devils are diving.
The Human Tidal Wave! Part Two!: Dane and Biff escape from an alien water creature.
The Human Tidal Wave! Part Three!: The water alien traps the Sea Devils in an experimental submarine.
The Human Tidal Wave! Part Four: The Sea Devils trick the water alien into destroying itself in a volcano.
ComicInfo.Tags: Dane Dorrance,Sea Devils,Biff Bailey,Nicky Walton,Judy Walton
ComicInfo.Title: The Human Tidal Wave! [Part 1]; The Human Tidal Wave! Part Two!; The Human Tidal Wave! Part Three!; The Human Tidal Wave! Part Four
